pxchat.gui
Class TextInputDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      pxchat.gui.TextInputDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class TextInputDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

This dialog provides a selection for the font size, the font type and a text area for the text input. The text will be converted to multiple DrawTextObjects and send over the network.

Author:
Florian Bausch
See Also:
Serialized Form

sendText

private void sendText()
Converts the text input into multiple DrawTextObject, a single one for each line, and sends the resulting objects over the network.
